text: Dada J.P. Vaswani (2 August 1918 â€“ 12 July 2018) was an Indian non-sectarian spiritual leader. He was born in Hyderabad, Sindh. He promoted vegetarianism and animal rights. He was the Spiritual Head at the Sadhu Vaswani Mission founded by his Guru, Sadhu T. L. Vaswani. Vaswani died on 12 July 2018 in Pune, Maharashtra from complications of a broken hip, aged 99. ==References== Category:1918 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Deaths from fractured hip Category:Indian writers Category:Animal rights activists
title: Dada Vaswani
